Highlights.name: Customer Software Applications
Highlights.description: awencon International is an IT solution company that offers a variety of services including Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Human Capital Management Systems (HCMS)

enhanced_description: Lawencon Internasional is an IT solutions company based in Jakarta, established in 2009. Their flagship product is LinovHR, a Human Capital Management System (HCMS) designed to help organizations manage and develop their human resources effectively. LinovHR is marketed as powerful, simple, and affordable, with modules developed organically from the ground up. Beyond HCMS, Lawencon offers a comprehensive suite of services including ready-to-use ERP solutions, custom software application development, IT support, and HR consulting services across various industries, alongside staffing services. They primarily target Large and Global Enterprise clients.
competitive_advantages: Offers powerful, simple, and affordable products
Develops modules organically from the ground up
Provides a comprehensive suite of IT solutions including HCMS, ERP, custom software, and IT support
Offers HR consulting and staffing services alongside technology products
